# FlashAnzan Angular Application

## Project Overview
FlashAnzan is a mental calculation training application based on the Japanese Anzan (mental arithmetic) method. Numbers flash on screen rapidly and users must calculate their sum.

## Tech Stack
- Angular 18+ with standalone components
- TypeScript (strict mode)
- Responsive design

## Development Guidelines
- Use standalone components (no NgModules)
- Follow Angular style guide
- Maintain TypeScript strict mode
- Implement reactive patterns with RxJS
